Album Notes
Personnel includes: Lou Gramm (vocals); Peter Wolf (keyboards, background vocals); Nils Lofgren, Peter Maunu, Vivian Campbell (electric guitar); Merry "The Diva" Clayton, Siedah Garrett, Darryl Phinnessee, Maxi Anderson, Phillip Ingram, Ina Wolf, Reinhold Bilgeri, Robin Clark, Lani Groves (background vocals).
Engineers include: Paul Ericksen, Gonzalo "Bino" Espinoza, Carlos Golliher.
